text.headline: Bachelor of Technology
text.text: Started my undergraduation at Manipal Institute of Technology

text.headline: My Introduction to Corporate World
text.text: This was the time when I was recruited as a Software Engineer at Societe Generale.

text.headline: Met with an accident
text.text: After getting my clavicle bone fractured twice, I had a take a time off to rehabilitate.

text.headline: Move to a startup
text.text: After working at an MNC, I realised i needed more accountability and a fast paced environment.I got my chance at Urja.io as a Data Engineer/Scientist role.

text.headline: Got promoted
text.text: I came into limelight within the organisation, by setting up the complete software pipeline and was promoted to Lead Data Engineer/Scientist.

text.headline: Masters at Northeastern University
text.text: Moved to Boston, Massachusetts to pursure Masters of Science (Information Systems).
